cause.description:
First Amendment Project is a nonprofit advocacy organization dedicated to protecting and promoting freedom of information, expression, and petition.
For over ten years, FAP has provided advice, educational materials, and legal representation to its core constituency of activists, journalists, and artists in service of these fundamental liberties.
1. Freedom of information
2. Freedom of expression
3. Freedom of assembly
cause.mission: To ensure freedom of expression in the United States
cause.name: First Amendment Project
